attributes.additional_details:
We ask for a law to ban the sale of knives in stores and shops to young people aged up to 20 years old.

I also ask for age to be debated by MPs.

We have had a law banning young people from buying tobbaco in shops.

We ask that shopkeepers and stores to ask for I.D. of young people.

And note down the home addresses for security and safety for the Police to get hold of whenever a crime is committed.

We also ask if knives could be made differently to minimise damage and have it approved by Trading Standards etc.
